settings.heading: Support
settings.body: Get help with your ERGOGAIN products, find setup guides, troubleshooting tips, and warranty information.

settings.title: Setup Guides
settings.text: Step-by-step instructions for setting up your ERGOGAIN products for optimal comfort and performance.

settings.title: Troubleshooting
settings.text: Common issues and solutions to help you get the most out of your ergonomic workspace.

settings.title: Warranty Information
settings.text: Learn about our comprehensive warranty coverage and how to submit a warranty claim.

settings.title: Contact Support
settings.text: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help with any questions or concerns.
